title: Acala Sets to Ignite DeFi Innovation with 159,441 ACA Token Burn in Acala 2.0 Initiative
description: Acala, a key player in the decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape within the Polkadot ecosystem, has announced a significant move as part of its Acala 2.0 initiative. The protocol is gearing up to burn a substantial number of its tokens, specifically 159,441 ACA tokens, on December 26th. The strategic decision is not just a routine operation; […]

title: Navigating the Future – The Evolution of Automation and AI’s Impact
